samples.question: [Transcript chunk 2]
samples.transcript: Because when we go out and it is the first thing people will notice because from with earrings if you have long hair like me sometimes it is hidden underneath so you would not really see it and with the hand you can kind of see it as well but you know from far away the first thing people would see is the necklace have you ever bought jewelry for someone else yes i bought like rings for my sister because she really likes julie as well so i when i go out and i see like pretty jewelry sometimes i would buy it for her and just like send her pictures why do you think some people spend a lot of money on jewelry i think it is partly because of their hobby so some people like to collect jewelry and most people when they get jewelry they feel that you know it is like something that when they wear they have confidence with it and sometimes if they do not have these jewelry with them they might feel that they are lacking something or something's like missing so it is kind of some a way to show their confidence.
